extendedIngredients.name: fish

extendedIngredients.name: fish
extendedIngredients.original: Steam the fish until tender (about 10 mns or less depending on the thickness of fish – check regularly as you do not want to overcook the fish).

extendedIngredients.name: Top Sirloin
extendedIngredients.original: Place all vegetables in the top part of a steamer and cook for only 3 mns. It does not take more time since the vegetables are all very thin.

title: Red Trout and Vegetable Peels with Garlic Cream — Pelures de légumes, truite rosée et sa crème d’ail
